blades-ng.acquisition: Talk to him at Megaflote Base

bspon.description: On a pointy ledge off the cliff of the plains. Visible/short distance from Torigoth Arch Travel Point
Northeast corner of the balcony. Story locked.
Behind the corals by the cliff
Fast Travel to Ruined Laborers' Bridge, on the ground level inside the building.
South from the Ether Refinery Corridor Travel Point
On the outstretch next to the Salvage Point
On a ledge on the south side of the Passage after the bridge
South side of the room across the bridge
Next to the 12 Brothersisterpon shop keeper. Story locked.

doubloons.description: On stack of boxes behind the exchange. Requires quest to be active before appearing.
Access from Upper Level - Right - Varnax's Plunge during low tide and jump down the waterfall
Climb the ladder and pass Wind Mastery checks
Go down Old Pilgrim's Road and jump down before Ruins of Fountain Park
Southwest of Travel Point by the cliff
Along the way in the palace during story
Excavation chest at the short end
Under View of a Lost Time secret area. Accessed from Highway 8 using the Street sign. Requires Lv. 8 Earth Mastery and Lv. 5 Superstrength.

expman.description: Ride the moving island until you reach the one with the chest
expman.name: Pouch Expansion Kit 4

expman.description: From Smuide Mountain (factory in the city), ride the cargo lift and jump off to the lone island. Chest is off the Northeastern edge.
expman.name: Pouch Expansion Kit 6

expman.description: Down the elevator, in the room with Haywire Radclyffe
expman.name: Hypertech Made Easy

foorara.description: On a crane outside Bower Lounge/above Salvage Deck
On top of the windmill. Climb the watchtower and jump across buildings.
In Garfont Village. Requires Lv. 3 Fire Mastery and Lv. 2 Wind Mastery.
Warp to Mymoma Playhouse, head down the stairs to Commercial District, jump up the buildings
Before Ch.8, he is inside a cave in the Kingdom of Indol - Refugee Campground with a Lv. 4 Earth Mastery and Lv. 3 Superstrength check
Jump down to the hot springs, head to the outside balcony area
